ComicInfo.Title: E; Black Octopus: Sexy Genius
ComicInfo.Summary:
The horse has made it's final stop: Heaven, the peaceful resort in the afterlife. Here, Scud has come across God and his angels. But they aren't as they seem. For they have The Lord hostage in their prison.
Now the angels have given Scud a decision to make. And the repercussions of it will not only have an effect on himself, but on every single life on Earth as well. This time, the stakes will be high, sacrifices will be made, and Scud's life will never be the same again.
The second-to-last arc of this series comes to its frightening climax in "E: for Evangelion."
